text: [Music]
the man who found fear at last once upon
a time there lived a brave and fearless
lad named Triton in the land of stroke
our bravery was not uncommon but for

that it was unwise and some reckless but
the boy literally did not know what fear
was Oh Triton you were so brave do you
not get scared at all
what is that fear when something
frightens you and you get just
frightened it must be quite odd to feel
something like that I shall look for it
anyway good day to you good day
since everyone kept telling him about
fear Triton became very curious he
decided to venture through the world to
find fear he walked and walked for hours
until he found a poor man sitting in the
woods and crying Oh kind sir please help
me my family they have been taken
hostage by the vicious dragon that lives
by the cave please help us sure I will
help you I shall conquer the dragon and
set your family free he ran forward in

dragon laying by the poor man's family
ah foolish boy have you come here to be
eaten I have come here to set those

you try
try to ran up a nearby tree and broke

aha you are mine now come on there you
go hi
Triton hopped off the dragon's back and

for you have saved my family
my name is arse on and I am truly

did you not get framed while facing the

far far away in a town called DRA far
there is an Oracle that will have the

Triton continued on his journey to find

reached the small town called drew far
as instructed he went to the Oracle when

inferno
hello Triton I have been waiting for you
how do you know my name
right in a fearless panties what they

Triton went to the ocean shore and dived
into the water upon reaching there he
found a ship stuck on a small iceberg

hail somebody hail I must help him try

on her hand was the bracelet the

he took the bracelet off the mermaid and

there
sad and dejected that he did not find

excuse me sir what is the bell ringing
mean the king of Jafar has announced his

the Phoenix will be unleashed whoever it
he'll fly up to he'll be taken to the

welcome Triton Your Majesty it is you

yes trainee I have been searching for a

attributes of a king the
you possess Triton so you mean to say

with the scary moment lady and

sure you will be a great game if you

Thank You King our son I humbly accept

and so Triton became the king of dry
